articles.author: Team Newsable
articles.title: Microsoft Teams introduces new feature, allow users to automatically delete stored recordings - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: Admins can turn off the auto-expiration option, which is enabled by default. If no action is done following the rollout, all new recordings will automatically expire 60 days after being captured.
